p: The plant was reported to have quercetin, which is known for its ability to inhibit the insulin-dependent activation of PI3K (Phosphoinositide 3-kinase) and to reduce intestinal glucose absorption by inhibiting glucose transporter [ 17]. Other species of the same genus, including C. verticillata and C. quadragualis, possess hypoglycemic and hypolipidemic activities [ 58, 62].
